name: Crow
descriptions: Crow is a spiritual caravan merchant, who sells clothing and armor around the Capital Wasteland in Fallout 3.
Crow is a tribal shaman turned caravan merchant, making a living as he travels the wastes offering armor and clothing to its people.

Despite his mystical aura, he can resort to more realistic commentary; while he believes the "spirits" have showered him with many gifts, he sees the Lone Wanderer's investment in him as the more "marketable" gift, and is self-aware that his caravan is the most profitable of all the traders as people are willing to spend more on armor.
Agatha mentions that she and Crow are friends. Crow can be found wandering the wastes with his caravan guard and brahmin.

Like all caravan merchants in the Capital Wasteland, Crow's route takes him to Canterbury Commons, the Temple of the Union, Agatha's house, Paradise Falls, Arefu, Evergreen Mills, Megaton and Rivet City.

topics.topic_text: Tell me about your trade caravan.
topics.response_text: My caravan sells clothing and armor, to decorate and protect the body while it endures the ravages of the physical world.{With a slightly airy and mystical tone.}
Have a look, see if anything calls out to you.{With a slightly airy and mystical tone.}

topics.topic_text: Can you repair something for me?
topics.response_text: Yes, but only if it wants to be repaired.
Welcome, welcome! My name is Crow, and I travel the land, offering vestments of protection. And you are fortunate I found you in time!

conversation.response_text: Stay safe on the path you travel.{Almost spiritual in tone}
Welcome, friend. Looking for more appropriate attire?
